title: Big Brother AU 2013
content:
Hi.

I'm looking for this font, used in intros and nominations in Big Brother AU 2013.

I've tried searching everywhere, but all I find is the font of the Big Brother logo itself, which is not what I'm looking for.

Thank you so much in advance! :)

- Kai Martinsen

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_4271.%2019.34.05.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_4862.%2019.34.29.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_6583.%2019.52.34.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_4637.%2019.52.54.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_6646.%2019.53.09.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202013-12-27%20kl_3637.%2019.53.32.png)

Font: 

 Gotham (Black) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: KaiMartinsen

comments.content: It looks very close to **[Gotham (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112922/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Gotham%20-%20Black&fid=80d5397ddfd5d0407adb1b98f877800f&fsize=48&text=CONSEQUENCE%20REAL%20DANGER%20SURVIVAL&wrap=2)** by H&FJ (probably further emboldened) though the /G is a bit different
Thank you so much! :) It's the closest looking... I'm happy with Gotham.
